name: Wreckless Bar
description:
CONTROLS :

  • Left/Right : Move
  • Space : Sprint
  • Shift : Serve!

Try to serve customers with the most reckless barman ever!

It's your first day on the job at this bar, and your task is to serve customers. However, the barman wants to put on a bit of a show...

RULES:

Accumulate as many items on your tray as possible and serve when the stack is at its highest to earn maximum points.

Be careful not to slip!

Credits :

  • Xarius: Programming, Graphics, Sound
  • Plume: Programming, Graphics, Sound, Music
